caption.p: Visualization of ZIKV transcytosis. The ZX images of confocal microscopy depicted the distribution of atto647-ZIKV from the apical side to the basolateral side within JEG-3 cells (A) and hCMEC/D3 cells (B) at 0, 30, and 60 min post-infection. The white arrows indicated att647-ZIKV particles (red) (A,B). Nucleus was stained by DAPI staining (blue in A), and cell membrane was stained by WGA488 (green) (A,B).
